IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: ARCHEWELL FOUNDATION IS AN IMPACT-DRIVEN NONPROFIT CREATED BY THE DUKE AND DUCHESS OF SUSSEX. ARCHEWELL FOUNDATION'S CORE PURPOSE IS TO UPLIFT AND UNITE COMMUNITIES - LOCAL AND GLOBAL, ONLINE AND OFFLINE - ONE ACT OF COMPASSION AT A TIME. ARCHEWELL FOUNDATION BELIEVES THAT COMPASSION IS THE DEFINING CULTURAL FORCE OF THE 21ST CENTURY AND, THROUGH ITS WORK, ARCHEWELL FOUNDATION SUPPORTS A GROWING COMMUNITY OF PARTNER ORGANIZATIONS FUELING SYSTEMIC CULTURAL CHANGE. ARCHEWELL FOUNDATION LISTENS TO PEOPLE AND THEIR COMMUNITIES, HELPS THEM TELL THEIR STORIES, PUTS REAL ACTION BEHIND ITS WORDS, AND SPOTLIGHTS A NEW GENERATION OF LEADERSHIP.
IRS990.MissionDesc: ARCHEWELL FOUNDATION IS AN IMPACT-DRIVEN NONPROFIT CREATED BY THE DUKE AND DUCHESS OF SUSSEX. ARCHEWELL FOUNDATION'S CORE PURPOSE IS TO UPLIFT AND UNITE COMMUNITIES - LOCAL AND GLOBAL, ONLINE AND OFFLINE - ONE ACT OF COMPASSION AT A TIME. ARCHEWELL FOUNDATION BELIEVES THAT COMPASSION IS THE DEFINING CULTURAL FORCE OF THE 21ST CENTURY AND, THROUGH ITS WORK, ARCHEWELL FOUNDATION SUPPORTS A GROWING COMMUNITY OF PARTNER ORGANIZATIONS FUELING SYSTEMIC CULTURAL CHANGE. ARCHEWELL FOUNDATION LISTENS TO PEOPLE AND THEIR COMMUNITIES, HELPS THEM TELL THEIR STORIES, PUTS REAL ACTION BEHIND ITS WORDS, AND SPOTLIGHTS A NEW GENERATION OF LEADERSHIP.
IRS990.Desc: UPLIFTING COMMUNITIES: THE ARCHEWELL FOUNDATION UPLIFTS COMMUNITIES ACROSS THE GLOBE BY INVESTING TIME AND RESOURCES INTO PEOPLE AND PLACES THAT FOSTER MEANINGFUL BONDS AND HELP PEOPLE THRIVE.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: BUILDING A BETTER ONLINE WORLD: AT THE ARCHEWELL FOUNDATION, WE ARE PUTTING PEOPLE FIRST AND MAKING INVESTMENTS IN INNOVATIVE, UPSTREAM SOLUTIONS AIMED AT CREATING A TECHNOLOGY ECOSYSTEM DESIGNED FOR GOOD - ONE THAT IS SAFE, HEALTHY, INCLUSIVE, AND INNOVATIVE.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: RESTORING TRUST IN INFORMATION: THE ARCHEWELL FOUNDATION PROMOTES INFORMATION INTEGRITY AND ETHICAL JOURNALISM AS A FUNDAMENTAL RIGHT - AN ESSENTIAL NEED FOR THE WELLBEING OF COMMUNITIES AND DEMOCRACIES THE WORLD OVER. AS WE SEEK THE CREATION OF A BETTER, MORE TRUSTWORTHY, AND DIVERSE INFORMATION ENVIRONMENT ACROSS ALL FORMS OF MEDIA, WE SUPPORT RESEARCH AND ORGANIZATIONS CREATING A MORE INFORMED, FACT BASED, AND MORE CONNECTED WORLD.

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.PersonNm: PRINCE HARRY THE DUKE OF SUSSEX

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING STANDARDS BOARD'S (FASB'S) ACCOUNTING STANDARDS CODIFICATION TOPIC NO. 740, UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES, THE ARCHEWELL FOUNDATION RECOGNIZES THE IMPACT OF TAX POSITIONS IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS IF THAT POSITION IS MORE LIKELY THAN NOT TO BE SUSTAINED ON AUDIT, BASED ON THE TECHNICAL MERITS OF THE POSITION. DURING THE YEAR ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2022, THE ARCHEWELL FOUNDATION PERFORMED AN EVALUATION OF UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AND DID NOT NOTE ANY MATTERS THAT WOULD REQUIRE RECOGNITION IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS OR WHICH MIGHT HAVE AN EFFECT ON ITS TAX-EXEMPT STATUS.

AccountActivitiesOutsideUSGrp.RegionTxt: EUROPE (INCLUDING ICELAND & GREENLAND) - ALBANIA, ANDORRA, AUSTRIA, BELGIUM

GrantsToOrgOutsideUSGrp.RegionTxt: EUROPE (INCLUDING ICELAND & GREENLAND), ALBANIA, ANDORRA, AUSTRIA, BELGIUM
GrantsToOrgOutsideUSGrp.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TO SUPPORT INDEPENDENT RESEARCH INVESTIGATING THE INTERCONNECTED ROLES OF SOCIAL MEDIA, MEDIA, OTHER CONTENT PRODUCERS, INFLUENCERS, AND JOURNALISM IN AFFECTING HOW DEMOCRATIC DISCOURSE HAPPENS IN A DIGITAL AGE.

GrantsToOrgOutsideUSGrp.RegionTxt: EUROPE (INCLUDING ICELAND & GREENLAND), ALBANIA, ANDORRA, AUSTRIA, BELGIUM
GrantsToOrgOutsideUSGrp.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TO PROMOTE THE NON-COMMERCIAL DISSEMINATION OF INDEPENDENT, FACTUAL, AND EDUCATIONAL NEWS INFORMATION IN UKRAINE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GRANT AGREEMENTS ARE MADE WITH OBLIGATIONS ON RECEIVING ORGANIZATION TO PROVIDE REGULAR UPDATES AND AN IMPACT REPORT 12 MONTHS AFTER THE GRANT WAS MADE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, SCHEDULE F, PART IV, QUESTION 1
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 926 IS NOT REQUIRED TO BE FILED BECAUSE THE TRANSFER TO A FOREIGN CORPORATION DOES NOT MEET THE REPORTING REQUIREMENTS IN IRC SEC. 6038(A)(1)(A).

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TO SUPPORT GRANTEE'S INITIATIVE ON GENDER JUSTICE AND OPPORTUNITY TO BUILD TRAININGS ADDRESSING ADULTIFICATION-BIAS AND THE INEQUITIES FACED BY BLACK GIRLS IN THE JUSTICE, EDUCATION AND MEDICAL SYSTEMS.
TO CREATE A PLAY SPACE FOR PLAY THERAPY AND HEALING FOR CHILDREN AND THE COMMUNITY AT DELEON PARK IN UVALDE, TEXAS.
TO SUPPORT THE DIGITAL CIVIL RIGHTS AWARD WHICH SUPPORT ACTIVISTS WORKING TOWARDS RACIAL EQUALITY.
TO DELIVER MEDICAL SUPPLIES AND ASSISTANCE, PROVIDE SHELTER TO FAMILIES FLEEING VIOLENCE, AND DISTRIBUTE RISK EDUCATION MESSAGES IN PERSON AND ON SOCIAL MEDIA IN UKRAINE.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: HOPE LAB YOUTH POWER FOR RESPONSIBLE TECHNOLOGY FUND

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TO SUPPORT THE YOUTH POWER FOR RESPONSIBLE TECHNOLOGY FUND.
TO SUPPORT THE EQUIMUNDO STATE OF THE WORLD FATHERS REPORT 2023.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: GIRLS WHO CODE (MARSHALL PLANS FOR MOMS)

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TO UNDERWRITE A RESEARCH PROGRAM WHICH EXPLORES HOW REPRESENTATION OF AMERICAN MOTHERHOOD ON SCREEN CONTRIBUTES TO HARMFUL CULTURAL BELIEFS ABOUT MOTHERS THAT PREVENT THEM FROM RECEIVING STRUCTURAL SUPPORT.

TO ASSIST WITH THE RESPONSE IN UKRAINE BY PROVIDING VITAL SERVICES TO REFUGEES AND ASYLUM SEEKERS AND INCREASE RESOURCES FOR HOUSING, FOOD, AND TRANSPORTATION FOR THE MOST VULNERABLE, ESPECIALLY WOMEN AND GIRLS.
TO SUPPORT A CAPITAL REFURBISHMENT PROGRAM TO IMPROVE CANINE WELFARE.
TO SUPPORT THEIR WORK ON TECH ACCOUNTABILITY ESPECIALLY AS IT RELATES TO PARENTS AND FAMILIES.
TO EXPLORE, ANALYZE, AND UNDERSTAND THE INTERPLAY BETWEEN NEWS AND SOCIAL MEDIA IN PRODUCING, AMPLIFYING, AND ENABLING HATE SPEECH.
TO SUPPORT GLOBAL BOYHOOD INITIATIVE WHICH AIMS TO PROVIDE RESOURCES TO PARENTS, TEACHERS, AND BOYS TO FOSTER HEALTHY MASCULINITY AND GENDER EQUALITY.
TO SUPPORT THE CREATION OF A MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCE GUIDE.
TO SUPPORT AND STRENGTHEN COMMUNITY JOURNALISM AND WORK TOWARD AN ETHICAL AND OPEN FREE PRESS.
TO SUPPORT CIVIC TECH PROGRAMMING, AND TO SUPPORT THE ONGOING DIALOGUE BETWEEN MARCY LAB FELLOWS AND THEIR FAMILIES ABOUT TECH EQUITY AND THE FUTURE OF TECH.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: SAVE THE CHILDREN FEDERATION INC (SAVE THE CHILDREN NIGERIA)

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TO PROVIDE ASSISTANCE AND MEDICAL SUPPORT TO THOSE AFFECTED BY THE FLOODS IN NIGERIA.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: UNITED STATES FUND FOR UNICEF (UNICEF NIGERIA)

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TO PROVIDE ASSISTANCE, LIFE SAVING RESOURCES, AND MENTAL HEALTH SUPPORT TO THOSE AFFECTED BY THE FLOODS IN NIGERIA.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GRANT AGREEMENTS ARE MADE WITH OBLIGATIONS ON RECEIVING ORGANIZATION TO PROVIDE REGULAR UPDATES AND AN IMPACT REPORT 12 MONTHS AFTER THE GRANT WAS MADE.
THE NONFIXED PAYMENTS WERE DETERMINED BY THE BOARD BASED ON PERFORMANCE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, BOX B, REASON FOR AMENDMENT
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990, PART VII, SECTION B. INDEPENDENT CONTRACTORS SECTION IS BEING AMENDED TO CORRECT THE ADDRESS OF AN INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR THAT WAS INCORRECTLY STATED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MEGHAN, THE DUCHESS OF SUSSEX (DIRECTOR) AND PRINCE HARRY, THE DUKE OF SUSSEX (DIRECTOR) ARE MARRIED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 8B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT HAVE A COMMITTEE WITH THE AUTHORIZATION TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD, THEREFORE THIS QUESTION IS NOT APPLICABLE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF THE FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO THE BOARD FOR REVIEW PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AN ANNUAL DISCLOSURE QUESTIONNAIRE FOR IDENTIFYING CONFLICTS IS CIRCULATED TO ALL THE BOARD MEMBERS TO REVIEW, COMPLETE AND SIGN. IF A POTENTIAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST ARISES THEY ARE RESOLVED WITH THE ASSISTANCE AND ADVICE OF LEGAL COUNSEL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: WHEN SETTING THE COMPENSATION FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS ACTED IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE FOUNDATION'S CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, REVIEWED APPROPRIATE COMPARABILITY DATA, AND DOCUMENTED ITS DECISION IN THE RECORDS OF THE FOUNDATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
OUTSIDE PROGRAM CONSULTANTS: PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES 499,954. MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES 34,826. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 0. TOTAL EXPENSES 534,780.
